Therefore, I looked beyond the farmer, further into the food chain. This triggered me to create the Selko Revalet product line for preservation of by-products at the food and beverage production stage. Reducing the microbial challenge right at the source, while preserving the nutritional value and making them available as alternative raw materials for animal protein production.
